p: Participants were recruited from February 2017 to March 2018 from two male prison facilities in Jakarta, Indonesia, one of which was a specialized narcotic prison that houses persons charged with drug-related offenses. Both facilities are extremely overcrowded and HIV prevalence rates are higher compared to prisons in other parts of the country [ 57]. HIV testing is offered to all persons during intake into jails and also at the request of inmates [ 58]. Persons diagnosed with HIV may access ART at no cost through prison-based HIV subspecialty clinics located within each prison.
